sentences.en: Anyway , thank God, he didn't have time to babble.
sentences.cn: 感谢上帝, 他总算没来得及泄漏秘密.

sentences.en: Have you heard the babble of running water?
sentences.cn: 你听到那潺潺流水声了 吗 ?

sentences.en: I have no idea what he was babbling on about.
sentences.cn: 我不知道他在唠叨些什么。

sentences.en: I heard, even over the babble of the crowd, a sharp, shocked intake of breath.
sentences.cn: 即便人声鼎沸，我还是听到有人猛地倒抽一口冷气。

sentences.en: If your child often has a pacifier in his mouth, he may be less likely to babble and practice talking, or the pacifier may distort his speech.
sentences.cn: 如果你的宝宝经常含着奶嘴，那这样可能会减少宝宝牙牙学语，练习说话的机会，或者奶嘴可能会搅乱他的言语发展。

sentences.en: Instead of writing , I had been able to babble to you.
sentences.cn: 我能够对你用唠唠叨叨的谈话代替写信.

sentences.en: Keep where thou canst hear the babble of the brook. "
sentences.cn: 就在能听到流水声的地方好了. ”

sentences.en: Kemp knocked loudly so as to be heard above the high babble of voices.
sentences.cn: 肯普大声敲着，好让人们在一片高声喧嚷中听到他的声音。

sentences.en: Momma babbled on and on about how he was ruining me.
sentences.cn: 妈妈喋喋不休地数说他在如何毁我。

sentences.en: Pockets of silence are better than padding an interview with random babble.
sentences.cn: 片刻间歇的缄默比用胡说八道填充面试要更好.

sentences.en: Similar to us, birds learn to sing by mimicking the adults, and the early chirps are akin to a baby's babble.
sentences.cn: 和人类一样，鸟类通过模仿长者学习鸣叫，最开始鸣叫时类似于婴儿的牙牙学语。

sentences.en: Teachers do not like students who babble on about nothing.
sentences.cn: 老师不喜欢整天不知所云的学生.

sentences.en: The babble of voices in the next compartment annoyed all of us.
sentences.cn: 隔壁的车厢隔间里不间歇的嘈杂谈话声让我们都很气恼.

sentences.en: The heavy smells , the foreign babble , the garish multitudinous signs in a strange alphabet, dizzied him.
sentences.cn: 那股强烈的气味, 那种陌生的语言,以及许多稀奇古怪的文字写的花里花哨的招牌, 叫他头昏眼花.

sentences.en: The water will cling round your feet and babble its secret.
sentences.cn: 湖水将回绕在你的脚边,潺潺地说出它的秘密.

sentences.en: They began to curse and shout in a babble of languages.
sentences.cn: 他们开始用不同的语言叽里咕噜地谩骂吵嚷起来。

sentences.en: They could hear a loud babble of voices coming from the crowded bar.
sentences.cn: 他们能听到拥挤的酒吧传出来的嘈杂声.

sentences.en: This high - pitched babble is presumably for courtship, although scientists are not certain.
sentences.cn: 据推测,这可能是雄性老鼠在求爱, 尽管科学家对这一点还不是很确定.

words.tran_cn: 胡说之人；说话模糊不清的人
胡说；婴儿发出的咿哑声
呀呀学语，喋喋不休（babble的现在分词形式）
含糊不清的话；胡言乱语；潺潺声

trans.tran_cn: 胡言乱语，含糊不清的话，潺潺声
trans.tran_en: the confused sound of many people talking at the same time

trans.tran_cn: 呀呀学语, 喋喋不休, 作潺潺声, 泄露(秘密)
trans.tran_en: to make a sound like water moving over stones

trans.tran_cn: 喋喋不休，作潺潺声，呀呀学语
